title: The Importance of L'Abri to the 21st Century (Francis & Edith Schaeffer, Rookmaaker, Swiss L'Abri)
description:
The L'Abri Fellowship up in the Vaudois Alps of Switzerland occupies a curiously important place in history. But L'Abri's importance is not relegated to the past. Its lesson are even more vital for this highly abstract virtual age. From human conversation to setting flowers on the table the example of L'Abri can be a guide for us living in the unprecedented strangeness of the times. Francis and Edith Schaeffer started L'Abri back in 1955. Its heyday was in the 1960s and 1970s. Many people forgot about it after the death of the Schaeffers, yet it continues to be a beacon. Let's explore why?
...............

Here's the PayPal link in case you want to help out ....
Click this...    https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne

#Switzerland #FrancisSchaeffer  #L'Abri
